message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll compromise.  Let's try 55/45 this time.  It's still a good deal for both of us, considering inflation.
Inflation is on my side, let's try this split!

Bob, inflation is really hurting me. Let's stop this before we both lose out.  I'll take 40, you take 60.  Let's end this now.
